member.summary: A temporary helper class to workaround CORE-744. member.name: T:Geocortex.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowAsync
member.summary: Activity that invokes another workflow asynchronously using WorkflowInvoker
member.remarks: The invoked workflow is subject to the rules of WorkflowInvoker. Persistence is not allowed within the invoked workflow (no bookmarks). An asynchronous workflow will run as a background process and will not block execution of the current workflow. An asynchronous workflow can not return output values. An asynchronous workflow can not throw exceptions to the main workflow.
